title: Newbies first post
content:
Hi friends!   
This is my first post here and in the next days/weeks I will present some of my typedesigns, so you can tell me what you think. Here comes a quick attempt I started tonight. Tell me if it
author: fraternemo

comments.content: not exactly legible but very original
I think your m has one arc too many...

Hi Meir!   
   
Thanks for your reminder: I know that there is an obsolete arc but I thought it looks very funny and somehow strange, so people look twice. Sometimes I love to bemuse a bit ...   
   
Cheers!
I would look at the descender on the g, it dosnt have the same feeling that the others do and it seems as though its longer than the others. Perhaps the j is just too short.
I like the one too many arcs on M. I thought that was great.
